content:
Utility staff in Lugansk were forbidden to verify water meters if the owner does not provide Russian documents.

About thisreported March 21Chairman of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration Artem Lisogor.

"Currently, people are forced to receive Russian passports with new methods," Artem Lisogor wrote.

According to him, the Lugansk is required by the Russian certificate, the insurance number of the individual personal account and the registration number of the taxpayer's account card.

Asreported the armyinform, the Russians blazes the Internet and telephone communication in temporarily occupied territories.
title: In the occupied territories of people blackmailing counter
description: This was reported on March 21 by the head of the Luhansk Regional Military Administration Artem ...
author: Army Inform
